spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is maintained with high fidelity. Wall alignments and room placements match the 2D source. Minor inaccuracies noted in the external balcony depth/railing thickness relative to the interior floor space.

structural_fidelity.notes: Doorways are correctly embedded. The adjacency relationships between bedrooms and toilets are preserved. Some wall thickness variations occur near the entrance foyer and utility area.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent mapping of furniture layouts. Living room rug, dining table set, and bed orientations are almost identical to the 2D plan. Scale is consistent.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean isometric projection with professional soft lighting. Geometry is sharp with no significant artifacts. Composition is clear and easy to read.

detected_errors.description: Minor displacement or thickening of the wall separating the foyer from the utility zone.
The railing/parapet for the upper deck appears slightly taller/thicker than the 2D plan indicates relative to internal living dimensions.
Slight shadow clipping near the kitchen peninsula/countertop intersection.
